verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nenda katoe sadaka toka mashambani,
usisite ndugu nenda ukatoe.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Simama ndugu simama ndugu,
Mtolee Mungu wako pato lako.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nenda katoe matunda toka mashambani,
usisite ndugu nenda ukatoe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nenda katoe na fedha toka mifukoni,
usisite ndugu nenda ukatoe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nenda katoe mifugo toka vizizini,
usisite ndugu nenda ukatoe.
